## TerrainTechniqueParams.heightGradientWidth property

If `heightBasedColors` is defined, this value defines the width (in pixels) of the generated gradient texture (defaults to `128`<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
heightGradientWidth?: number;
```
